mapper.select:
select c.id as id, p.projectname as projectname, p.taskname as taskname, c.content as content, c.create_time as createTime, c.create_by as createBy, u.realname as realName from ( select * from pmp_project where (parentnode != '0' and parentnode is not null)
and projectname like '%${map.projectName}%'
and taskname like '%${map.taskName}%'
and id = '${map.taskid}'
) as p left join ( select * from pmp_comment where 1 = 1
and create_time < '${map.endDate}' and create_time > '${map.begDate}'
) as c on p.id = c.taskid left join ( select * from sys_user )as u on u.username = c.create_by where c.id is not null
and u.realname like '%${map.commentator}%'
order by c.create_time desc
